OASIS (Organising After-School & In-School) is a Community of Practice that began from a partnership between The Learning Trust and the Centre for Community Schools at Nelson Mandela University. This App is the outcome of the first project undertaken by OASIS. OASIS consists of various stakeholders working in the education space in the Nelson Mandela Bay Metro, with focus on learner support programmes.

The OASIS App provides a central and easily accessible platform which contains information on schools and NPO/NGOs with the aim of facilitating effective collaboration to strengthen the formal and informal education space in the Metro. The App is accessible to the broader public for informational purposes.

1. A directory information for schools, including a location map.\n 2. A database of NPO/NGOs working with schools in the Metro, according to 6 focus areas.\n 3. A toolkit-framework that aims to facilitate the process of collaborative partnerships between schools & NGOs.

The OASIS App is currently housed under the Faculty of Education in the Centre for the Community School at Nelson Mandela University.\n If you wish to get in touch or involved in the project, you may contact
